item.title: How to make dnf faster in Fedora
item.description: Setup the config file To make dnf (Dandified Yum) faster in Fedora, you can edit the [main] section in the file /etc/dnf/dnf.conf try the following optimization tips: Enable Fastest Mirrors Enable fastest mirrors so that dnf will check all mirrors for the fastest one: [main] ... faster_mirrors=True Enable DeltaRPM Delta RPM (DRPM) lets you install packages using binary difference between old and new packages.
